description: function to extract data from the conversation
name: extract_data

description.description: Create an entertaining 2-4 sentence summary of the conversation that would be shown in search results.

title.description: Create an entertaining short title for the user's question.

media.description: Include five or more self-help books, movies, video games, TV shows, novels, songs that speak to this exchange. If the assistant references media, expand on that media here.

author.description: Name of the author of the media

correlation.description: How this media relates to the user-assistant data.

media_type.description: Type of the media (e.g., book, movie, song, podcast, show, video)
